attributes.additional_details: To protect individuals who are isolated and away from a their community to not be wrongly accused of anything and have their friends turned against them from believing information that is not true and potentially putting them in harms way.
attributes.background: The purposeful misrepresentation, manipulation of data & fake news made illegal. An act of Parliament to be passed spelling this out.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly from your petition what you'd like the Government or Parliament to make illegal. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
